title: Outlook: New options to copy email items in the new Outlook for Windows and web
description: We're thrilled to introduce two new ways to copy email items in the new Outlook for web and Windows that will make your email management even more seamless and efficient.  Ctrl + Drag and Drop: Simply hold down the Ctrl key while dragging and dropping your email items to effortlessly duplicate them. It's a quick and intuitive way to manage your emails with precision.  Ctrl C + Ctrl V: For those who prefer the classic copy-and-paste method, we've got you covered! Just use Ctrl C to copy the email item and Ctrl V to paste it wherever you need.
